text: Hi everyone! My name is Ed and I work for a company called Seenit, a tech startup in London. We're about to begin migrating our site from Jekyll to HubSpot CMS, and then slowly updating the site piece by piece. Anyone with ideas or experience in doing this, I'd love to hear from you :wave:

Hi everyone. Newbie here. I started at a new company who is using the HubSpot CMS. I have a lot of experience with Wordpress/Jekyll/Gatsby so I'm hoping it won't be too difficult to adapt. If anyone has any resources for working locally with tools like gulp/sass that would greatly be appreciated. I'm also really curious about creating some sort of development/staging environment if possible. Thanks ahead of time.
